Nuclear & Uranium
Third-quarter 2024
U.S. production of uranium concentrate (U3Og) in the third quarter of 2024 totaled 121,296 pounds UsOg, a 24% increase from second quarter’s production of 97,709
pounds U3Qg. This quarter's total uranium production occurred at five facilities, three in Wyoming {Nichols Ranch ISR Project, Lost Creek Project, and Smith Ranch-
Highland Operation) and two in Texas (Alta Mesa Project and Rosita).
